August 29, 1943 | Approximately 1,600 Jewish men, women and children from the ghetto in Koluszki, occupied #Poland, arrive at #Auschwitz. 210 men and 17 women are admitted to the camp as prisoners, the other almost 1,400 people are killed in the gas chambers.

A 5.25-inch twin mount from the cruiser HMS Argonaut, Philadelphia, 1943. 

Cruisers used 'long trunk' mountings, with the central stalk of the turret extending to the magazines in the hold.

Battleships used 'short trunk' mountings, as they were situated on the ship's sides.
